Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2008 07:22AM - edited Feb 23, 2008 07:23AM by Maekelly Hi everyone,  I just finished my 3rd cycle of one week on and one week off.  I am now taking 4500mgs.  My feet are worst when I wake up.  They are getting red and burning.  Will call the onc. on Monday and see what he wants to do.  It really seems like this third cycle is when it starts to show itself.  Take care, Maekelly
Posts.Title: Xeloda---Hand and Foot Syn. AO44 GoldenEyes

Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2008 10:41AM Maekelly wrote: Hi, Iam new to this.  I have had breast cancer 3 times now.  This time it came back stage 4.  I was on Taxol and Avastin for 4 months, and then they stopped working.  I am on my 2nd cycle of Xeloda.  First one I had nausea a lot.  This time I have very little.  My markers have gone up, but they assured me I haven't been  on it long enough.  When should I see some results?  Maekelly
Posts.Title: Fellow Xelodians please read Watson sueco
